thread.title: Re: LOL: Cecile Richards insists PP is ‘non-partisan’ (if you don’t count these political donations)
thread.title_full: Re: LOL: Cecile Richards insists PP is ‘non-partisan’ (if you don’t count these political donations)

author: robert anthony
title: Re: LOL: Cecile Richards insists PP is ‘non-partisan’ (if you don’t count these political donations)

organizations.name: facebook share on twitter  planned parenthood

text:
LOL: Planned Parenthood’s Cecile Richards’ de-funding anxiety leads to ‘most ludicrous statement ever made’ Posted at 4:46 pm on February 2, 2017 by Doug P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Planned Parenthood has been facing the risk of losing federal funding ever since Republicans took control of Congress and the White House. PP President Cecile Richards said this morning they’re willing to seek dialog with the GOP, and that her organization is… well, you have to see it to believe it: Planned Parenthood President Cecile Richards: We're Non-Partisan, Ready To Make Deal With Trump https://t.co/K6aVmmvASs 
— RCP Video (@rcpvideo) February 2, 2017 
“Non-partisan”? Now THERE’S a laugh. The most ludicrous statement ever made https://t.co/zNJglJCXmN
